entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
